price: 193. Combattez-les jusqu’à ce qu’il n’y ait plus d’associâtrie et que la religion soit exclusivement à Allah. Et s’ils cessent (leurs hostilités et leur associâtrie), qu’il n’y ait plus alors d’agression hormis contre les injustes.
arabic: وَقَٰتِلُوهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ لَا تَكُونَ فِتۡنَةٞ وَيَكُونَ ٱلدِّينُ لِلَّهِۖ فَإِنِ ٱنتَهَوۡاْ فَلَا عُدۡوَٰنَ إِلَّا عَلَى ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: waqātilūhum ḥattā lā takūna fit'natun wayakūna al-dīnu lillahi fa-ini intahaw falā ʿud'wāna illā ʿalā al-ẓālimīna
